taskSteps.stepTitle: Confirm passwords and settings on existing network and server equipment
Check Access to Microsoft Active Directory
Verify Microsoft SQL server access and permissions
Verify access to remote XProtect VMS systems that will be interconnected

phaseTasks.taskTitle: Configure cameras and other IP hardware devices

taskSteps.stepTitle: Set a static IP address or configure DHCP and hostname
Verify firmware version with Milestone Supported Devices list
Mount cameras and other IP hardware devices
Add and verify user accounts and passwords
Enable remote management, such as Windows Remote Desktop
Check additional server software and settings
Verify the Management Server is running
Download and run Milestone Mobile server software from the Management Server
Specify URL and credentials to connect to the Management Server
Verify the Mobile Server is running
Download and run the XProtect Recording Server installer from the Management Server
Download and run the XProtect Recording Server installer from the Management Server
Download and run the Management Client software from the Management Server
Log in with the Management Client
Enter and verify the site information

phaseTasks.taskTitle: Configure Recording Servers and Failover Recording Servers

taskSteps.stepTitle: Review and update recording server information
Assign Failover Servers to Recording Servers
Disable all unused encoder video channels
Create additional camera, microphone, speaker, input, output, and metadata device groups
Add devices to the relevant groups
Configure device settings and define video streams
Verify and adjust microphone recording settings
Verify and adjust speaker recording settings
Define single and recurring Time Profiles
Create video and audio feed start and recording rules
Create system administrator email notification rules
Assign client behavior and time profiles
Configure client permissions and login authorization requirements
Assign users and groups to each role
Define overall security settings for each role
Define detail security settings for each role
Verify system performance via System Monitor
Install Milestone Mobile server (if not done previously)
Verify feed start and recording rules for Interconnected cameras
Verify user permissions to Interconnected cameras
Check workstation hardware, software, and settings
Download and run Smart Client installer from the Management Server
Create views for each view group
Install app from relevant online marketplace
Perform a walk test for all cameras with motion detection
Perform customer operator and staff training

taskSteps.stepTitle: Move a hardware device to another Recording Server
Save and load a system configuration
